column11: Given a large set of data, extracting frequent itemsets in this set is a challenging job in data mining. Many efficient algorithms have been proposed in the literature. The idea presented in this paper is to extract a condensed representation of the frequent itemsets called rule-free sets, instead of extracting the whole frequent itemsets collection.
